data.eml:eml: Revision of the Recent Mediterranean species of Mitromorpha Carpenter, 1865 (Gastropoda, Conoidea, Mitromorphidae) with the description of seven new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Amati, Bruno, Smriglio, Carlo, Oliverio, Marco (2015): Revision of the Recent Mediterranean species of Mitromorpha Carpenter, 1865 (Gastropoda, Conoidea, Mitromorphidae) with the description of seven new species. Zootaxa 3931 (2): 151-195, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3931.2.1
